pages.text: $(li)The Roadrunner is a small brown and yellow bird with blue feathers on their tail, wings and head.$(br)$(li)They run around the Desert at high speed searching theirpreis, $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/rattlesnake)Rattlesnakes$(/l).$(br)$(li)Roadrunners may drop Feathers and Roadrunner Feathers on death.
Roadrunners can be bred with Maggots.
